TopicTitle: Star Wars LAAT Gunship with launch system!

Articles.Content:
The pilot cannot exit the cockpit so be sure you have the right Kerbal piloting when you liftoff! It also holds 6 Kerbals in seats in the belly, 2 in a lander can in front of the seats, and one in a gunner pod on each side of the ship. The final nuclear engines should hold about 3000 dv but can be refueled. Also note: The

ascent can be very unstable during the gravity turn but can be recovered if it begins to flip. I've tested it multiple times and was able to reach orbit with most of the fuel from the stage before the nuclear engines kick in after a bad flip in the atmosphere.

Album:

Download Here: http://www./download/eu1w98a6klo7fv1/LAAT_(Space).craft

Enjoy and let me know what you think as well as any bugs with the design!

Edited June 5, 2013 by stoddard14

Well done! I like it, very faithful to the original. I modded mine so the pilot kerbal can get in and out by adding a few retractible ladders.

Also, you need to fix your img tag as you have it set as the link to your album rather than the url of the image. You can fix it by writing the code as (url=http://imgur.com/a/Pdnwk)(img)http://i.imgur.com/uXEGynq.png(/img)(/url) - just replace the () brackets with [] and you should be good to go.
small little thing here but the LAAT was a two seat craft not a one seat.
I like how you used the Rockomax adapter.
There was gunners in the wings I believe
nope the ones in the wings were remote/droid controlled only 4 crew 1 pilot 1 co-pilot and 2 gunners, also have you ever thought at trying your hand at a pelican from halo?
